title: (x) "Droog Event 2: Urban Play" squarish slab serif - Morgan Avec {Akira}
content:
If anyone could help with this one, would be greatly appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081211064957im_/http:/typophile.com/files/0202_4901.gif)

 [‹ Does anybody know what this font is?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081211064957/http:/typophile.com/node/50357 "Go to previous forum topic") ["Bravefont" spoof movie trailer for Extensis Suitcase Fusion 2 ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081211064957/http:/typophile.com/node/50228 "Go to next forum topic")
author: apparatus™

comments.content:
Can’t place it. What’s the source?

Alternatives:  
 [Prelo Slab](http://web.archive.org/web/20081211064957/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/dstype/prelo_slab_black/?sample_text=DROOG%20EVENT%202)  
 [Soho](http://web.archive.org/web/20081211064957/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/soho_std_extra_bold/?sample_text=DROOG%20EVENT%202)  
 [United](http://web.archive.org/web/20081211064957/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/house_industries/united_serif_regular_black/?sample_text=DROOG%20EVENT%202)

Sorry for the late response and thanks for the options.  
The source is:  
 [http://www.experimentadesign.nl/2008/en/0202.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081211064957/http:/www.experimentadesign.nl/2008/en/0202.html "http://www.experimentadesign.nl/2008/en/0202.html")

It’s similar to [Morgan Avec](http://web.archive.org/web/20081211064957/http:/www.felicianotypefoundry.com/main/?page_id=15).

EDIT:  
They might have used small caps of Morgan Avec Bold.
Apart from the fact that it isn’t bold enough and the little serif on the baseline stroke of the 2 is missing in Morgan Avec, it is _incredibly_ close.

Hi Yves,  
I don’t think it is bold enough, too. But, about the 2, [the newer version](http://web.archive.org/web/20081211064957/http:/www.felicianotypefoundry.com/main/?page_id=68) has the 2 like that. Several characters, e.g. the 2 or the G, seem to have been changed.
Oh! Didn’t know that. Maybe it’s a weight that still has to be released publicly, or a custom weight by Mario for the event?

Thank you, Florian. ;^)  
I seem to have found [the answer](http://web.archive.org/web/20081211064957/http:/www.felicianotypefoundry.com/main/?page_id=230).

\> _The unrivaled Akira strikes again!_

Dude, I tell ya, some nights I wake up bathing in cold sweat. Akira is freaky scary good. :^/
